body:
How it was tested:
- [x] Four new versions of `plumed` have been successfully installed through Spack, loaded and called.
- [x] `spack install gromacs@2021+cuda~mpi+plumed` installed correctly.
- [x] Tried `spack spec gromacs@<version>+plumed` with various Gromacs versions **supported** by Plumed and checked what `plumed` versions are resolved. They seems to be correct.
title: Added missing Plumed 2.5-2.7 versions to Gromacs package
